questions.text: 1) Which of the following best describes your current workplace?

answers.text: b) Local education agency or school district (including local charter network)

questions.text: Which of the following best describes your role? Please select all that apply.

answers.text: School or district clinician (i.e. counselor, psychologist, social worker)

questions.text: Which of the following best describes your role? Please select all that apply.
Which of the following responsibilities are mostly closely aligned with your role and purview? Please select all that apply.

answers.text: I make recommendations for mental health/well-being solutions to be adopted by schools in my jurisdiction
I make final purchasing decisions for mental health/well-being solution adoption for schools in my jurisdiction
I am a primary contact point for stakeholder engagement of schools in my jurisdiction
I am responsible for the implementation and/or oversight of mental health/well-being solutions for schools in my jurisdiction

questions.text: Which of the following responsibilities are mostly closely aligned with your role and purview? Please select all that apply.

openEndedQuestions.text: What is your first and last name?
What is your current job title?
We would love to reach out with additional resources to support you on your journey. What is your preferred email?
